title: Import Menu
description: Upload a CSV file to quickly create your menu with categories, products, and modifiers

export.title: Export Your Current Menu
export.description: Download your existing menu to edit and re-import later. All your products, categories, and settings will be exported.
export.advancedDesc: Advanced format with all details exported

templates.title: Download Empty Template
templates.basicDesc: Simple menu with categories and products (name, SKU, price, description)
templates.advancedDesc: Complete menu with inventory, modifiers, allergens, tags, and more

upload.title: Upload CSV File
upload.dropzone: Drag and drop your CSV file here, or click to browse

mode.title: Import Mode
mode.mergeDesc: Add new products and categories. Update existing products by SKU. Don't delete anything.
mode.replaceDesc: Delete all existing menu data and replace with CSV contents. This cannot be undone!
mode.warning: ⚠️ Warning: Replace mode will permanently delete your current menu

preview.title: Preview
preview.noData: No data to preview. Upload a CSV file first.

validation.title: Validation
validation.valid: ✓ CSV is valid and ready to import
validation.invalid: ✗ CSV has errors. Please fix them before importing:

success.title: Menu imported successfully!
success.message: Created {{categories}} categories, {{products}} products, and {{modifierGroups}} modifier groups
